tool_description: Evaluates the effectiveness of different pricing strategies by analyzing their performance against strategic objectives and KPIs.

strategy_name.description: Name of the pricing strategy being evaluated

target_metrics.description: List of KPIs to evaluate strategy against

weight_revenue.description: Weight for revenue impact in overall evaluation

weight_margin.description: Weight for margin impact in overall evaluation

weight_volume.description: Weight for volume impact in overall evaluation

weight_market_share.description: Weight for market share impact in overall evaluation

error_messages: Strategy not found: The specified pricing strategy name is not recognized.
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 datetime strings.
Invalid target metrics: One or more specified metrics are not available for evaluation.
Invalid weights: All weight values must be between 0 and 1, and should sum to approximately 1.0.
Evaluation period too short: Strategy evaluation requires at least 30 days of data for meaningful analysis.
usage: Specify strategy_name and evaluation date range, provide target_metrics array for assessment. Adjust weight parameters to reflect strategic priorities in the evaluation.

overall_effectiveness_score.description: Overall strategy effectiveness score from 0 to 100

metric_performance_scores.description: Individual performance scores for each target metric

strategy_strengths.description: Key strengths identified in the pricing strategy

strategy_evaluation_summary.description: Comprehensive summary of strategy evaluation results
